thread.title: Glencore Sinks To All-Time Low On Continued Debt Fears
thread.title_full: Glencore Sinks To All-Time Low On Continued Debt Fears - WSJ

author: Alex MacDonald
title: Glencore Sinks To All-Time Low On Continued Debt Fears
text:
LONDONâ€”Shares in commodities giant Glencore PLC sank 19% to a new all-time low on Monday as the trader and miner struggles to convince investors that it will be able to meet its net debt targets if commodity prices remain low or fall further.
Shares in the Swiss trader and producer of a range of commodities from copper to coal, oil and grains fell to an intraday low of 78.6 pence a share before paring back some of the losses.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
